title: Fix Test Mock Pollution Issues
overview:
Test mock pollution causes 13 test failures, specifically affecting git/index.test.ts when run after workflow.test.ts.

**Motivation:** Test reliability - ensures tests pass consistently regardless of execution order.

**Signals:** priority: medium
